mapper.insert: insert into Robot_Status_Time (Record_Time, ModelName, StationName, RobotNo, Building, Floor, Area, ErrorInfo, RobotStatus, StartTime, EndTime, TotalTime, TimeFlag, Ex_Value1, Ex_Value2, Ex_Value3, Ex_Value4, Ex_Value5, Ex_Value6) values (#{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modelname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{stationname,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{robotno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{building,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{errorinfo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{robotstatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totaltime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{timeflag,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue2,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue3,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue4,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue5,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{exValue6,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select Record_Time, ModelName, StationName, RobotNo, Building, Floor, Area, ErrorInfo, RobotStatus, StartTime, EndTime, TotalTime, TimeFlag, Ex_Value1, Ex_Value2, Ex_Value3, Ex_Value4, Ex_Value5, Ex_Value6 from Robot_Status_Time

select COUNT(*) from Robot_Status_Time a where exists(select * from (select RobotNo,MAX(starttime) as FTime from Robot_status_time group by RobotNo) x where x.RobotNo = a.RobotNo and a.starttime = x.FTime)
select COUNT(*) from Robot_Status_Time a where a.TimeFlag ='RUNNING'
select sum(a.RunTimes) from Robot_Status_ByHour a where a.Area = '${area}' and a.Building = '${building}' and a.Floor = '${floor}' and a.Record_Time between '${startTime}' and '${overTime}'
select sum(a.StandbyTimes) from Robot_Status_ByHour a where a.Area = '${area}' and a.Building = '${building}' and a.Floor = '${floor}' and a.Record_Time between '${startTime}' and '${overTime}'
select sum(a.ErrorTimes) from Robot_Status_ByHour a where a.Area = '${area}' and a.Building = '${building}' and a.Floor = '${floor}' and a.Record_Time between '${startTime}' and '${overTime}'
select COUNT(*) from Robot_Status_Time a where a.TimeFlag ='RUNNING' and a.RobotNo = #{robotno}
select COUNT(*) from Robot_Status_Time a where a.RobotNo = #{robotno}
